item.title: A bit about me...
item.description: I am a recent graduate of Claremont McKenna College, where I majored in Computer Science (through neighboring Pomona College). I am curious, outgoing, and hard-working. I like to play chess, poker, and basketball. Feel free to add me on chess.com if you play. I also like to read… everything from graphic novels to personal essays. I write some of my musings about tech, film, and other miscellaneous topics on my blog.

item.title: Chess Bot
item.description: Chess AI Play chess against an engine!
